channel.title: playframework on Ray's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in playframework on Ray's Blog

item.title: Play With Play 06
item.description: module in play 说一下playframework 里面的 module. 我在用 springboot 的时候, 有时候会自己写下 springboot-starter, 想到其实module 跟 starter 很相似, 都能够给你封装 bean, 都能给你封装

item.title: Play With Play 04
item.description: Custom annotation add attrs to request. request = request.addAttr(TypedKey, value); NOTE: 这个request=request... 一定要加上, 不然你以为你加上去了,但其实并没有. 最后当你request.att

item.title: Play With Play 03
item.description: Play UT practice 怎么写play 的UT, 尤其是写跟ebean 相关的 UT, 而且还有 component inject, 以及 component mock. ·End·

item.title: Swagger Practice
item.description: let’s use swagger to generate api docs Using Swagger in Spring project is very very simple, just import dependency and use api annotaion, done! Then you can use {projectBaseContext}/swagger.json to get apidocs! Now, how to use swagger on play2.7? add dependency in sbt // todo ignore _ebean_interator ·End·

item.title: Play With Play 02
item.description: Get request body 拿到body 并且转换成dto,而且我再吐槽一句, playframwork的官方guid上写的body 转 dto居然是自己写个annota

item.title: Play With Play 01
item.description: prepare install gradle install sbt gradle 我尝试去使用 gradle 去构建项目, 但是一时半会还没能理解 gradle 里面 plugins 怎么玩的, 遂放弃, 先把 play 玩起来再说. sbt I’m new one for playframwork. My intellij cannot import sbt project so that tried to run sbt
